name: Chess Competition Clock
description:
Chess Championship Clock, very useful tool for chess competitions. With customizable times and pause & resume like in actual championships. Single view no mess or extras.

- Limited game time for one player to max 60 minutes, normally there will 15, 20,30 minutes given to one player. If you have a requirement for different times, please let me know I will enable it and re upload the app.

Lone King counter will help decide draws more accurately.

Delay 5 Sec timer is used in many tournaments, so it is added with new release.

Designed and developed by a chess coach & tournament director.
